Let your viewers play a game in chat: 讓您的觀眾在聊天室遊玩遊戲
Game End Message Duration: 遊戲結束訊息持續時間
The duration in seconds to collect chat': The duration in seconds to collect chat's responses before passing them to the game
Command used by the chat to provide thei: Command used by the chat to provide their response
Message displayed to let the chat know t: Message displayed to let the chat know they didn't provide any input
Message displayed to let the chat know the game is restarting
Marker used to display where chat played: Marker used to display where chat played their turn. Please make sure it's not more than 1 character
Message to let everyone know that it's c: Message to let everyone know that it's chat's turn to play
Marker used to display where AI played i: Marker used to display where AI played it's turn. Please make sure it's not more than 1 character
Message to let everyone know that it's A: Message to let everyone know that it's AI's turn to play
Message displayed to let everyone know c: Message displayed to let everyone know chat won
Message displayed to let everyone know chat lost
Message displayed to let everyone know t: Message displayed to let everyone know the game was a draw
Message to let chat know that they canno: Message to let chat know that they cannot play the current move
Display the game ended message for these: Display the game ended message for these many seconds
Change the color of the tile to this col: Change the color of the tile to this color when a character is present in the word but is misplaced
Change the color of the character to thi: Change the color of the character to this if it is present in the word but is misplaced
Change the color of the tile to this col: Change the color of the tile to this color when a character is present in the correct location in the word
Change the color of the character to thi: Change the color of the character to this if it is present in the correct location in the word
Change the color of the tile to this col: Change the color of the tile to this color when a character is not present in the word
Change the color of the character to thi: Change the color of the character to this if it is not present in the word
Message to let the chat know they chose: Message to let the chat know they chose the wrong word. The word will still get evaluated, it's just an announcement
Message to let the chat know that the ch: Message to let the chat know that the chosen word is not valid. Reason for invalidation can include wrong character length and more
